mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, NOTICE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') CREATE_DATE, COUNT, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_CONTENT FROM TB_NOTICE JOIN TB_CATEGORY ON (NOTICE_CATEGORY = CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MEMBER_NO = NOTICE_WRITER) WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} AND TB_NOTICE.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, NOTICE_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICENO.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, #{userNo}, #{noticeContent}, SYSDATE, #{noticeCategory} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
